name: owncloud-infinite-scale
description: OCIS (OwnCloud Infinite Scale) is a modern, scalable, self-hosted file synchronization and collaboration platform. Itâ€™s built in Go and offers advanced permissions, sharing, and cloud-native architecture.
features: File synchronization: Keep files in sync across desktop and mobile devices with automatic conflict resolution.
Advanced sharing: Share files and folders with granular permissions including expiration dates and password protection.
Collaborative editing: Edit documents in real-time with other users using integrated office suite compatibility.
Scalable architecture: Deploy on cloud-native infrastructure with microservices that scale independently based on load.
Version control: Track file changes over time and restore previous versions when needed for data recovery.
External storage: Connect to S3, WebDAV, and other storage backends to unify access across multiple systems.
Mobile apps: Access and sync files from iOS and Android devices with native applications for offline use.
API access: Integrate with custom applications using WebDAV and REST APIs for programmatic file management.
